page.title: 09Farming in South Brent (2)
page.content:
The farms listed range in size from 4.5 to 260 acres, an average being 99.
{Livestock: 9 farms have sheep; av.170/farm,120/ac 13 have cattle; av.74/farm, 95/acre. 42 horses are kept (one farm has a riding school with 25), 2 goats and some poultry. {Crops: Out of 1782 acres, 154 are used for crops other than grass. Only one farm is entirely arable. Crop acreages: Wheat 80 Barley 61 Corn 24 Kale 14 Swedes 7 Potatoes 7.5 {Numbers of people living on farms}vary from 1 to 10, av.8. {Number employed}are from 0 to 8,av.1.8
